name: NG Space Company (Freddec)
description:
NG Space Company is a space incremental game where you start from humble beginnings on Earth, working your way up to travelling between star systems and building Dyson Spheres and pretty much colonising the entire galaxy(ies?)

  • More than 20 resources to mine
  • More than 100 machines to build
  • More than  20 missions to perform
  • More than 180 stars to conquer
  • And more, and more!

Discord: https://discord.gg/3UkgeeT9CV

Freddec Games: https://freddecgames.com/
